a.title: Creating a Home Where Your Child Can Thrive with a Disability

li.a: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA)
Creating a Home Where Your Child Can Thrive with a Disability

div.p: Our vision for the Doniphan R-I School District, in partnership with parents and community, is to relentlessly focus on maximum growth for all in a progressive learning environment empowering life-long learners and responsible active citizens.

div.div: On Thursday, April 9, Governor Parson ordered all schools closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. This closure, though necessary, does create difficult decisions as how to end this school year. Here are updates on the following topics.
Consultation meeting between the LEA, private school officials, and representatives of parents of parentally-placed private school children with disabilities on May 6th.
